name: Portland Marriott at Sable Oaks

reviews.text: There are many positive reviews of this hotel, and I'm sure a lot of people had great experiences there, but I did not. My husband and I booked this hotel for a weekend visit. At $199 a night in Maine, we expected to have a reasonably comfortable experience. Instead, a lot of little things added up to us never wishing to go back there.
reviews.title: I would not recommend this hotel

reviews.text: 1) our hotel room smelled strongly of chlorine/cleaning supplies (we weren't sure which one; it was a strong, unpleasant odor)
reviews.title: Pleasant stay

reviews.text: 2) one of the walls in the room had indentations that looked like someone had taken a bat to it
reviews.title: Loved It!!!!!!

reviews.text: We just had our wedding reception at this hotel last weekend. They have an excellent, all-inclusive wedding package.
reviews.title: Perfect For Our Wedding Reception

likes.liked: — Perfect for our wedding reception, close to the mall for shopping too

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As part of the package, they gave us a suite (which was really nice), the girls loved it, it had 3 sink areas in the room w/ huge mirrors, a large living room and dining room area and a separate bedroom. Not brand new, showing a little wear, but perfect for our needs.
reviews.title: Very pleased.

likes.liked: — Location and convenience to the airport and the bedding...
likes.disliked: — Dirty room service dishes and cleaning carts in hallways over an extended period of time.

reviews.title: Must Love Dogs
reviews.text: I really have no complaints about this place at all and it was definately accommodating to us and very convenient, but i did hear from some of our wedding guests that the accommodations seemed pretty expensive $199+/night depending... (Note: The hotel was also booked out last weekend).

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We did enjoy the breakfast brunch the next AM and it was very good. Omelettes to order, etc. This hotel would be perfect to stay at if you are in town visiting friends or relatives, attending an event or convention, golfing or in town for business. I would definately recommend it to anyone...
reviews.title: The Good, the Bad and the Noisy

likes.disliked: — Lack of a goods night sleep, paper thin walls

reviews.text: Just returned from a week in Maine where we spent two nights at the beginning and one night at the end of our trip, since we flew in and out of Portland. Overall our stay was very enjoyable. The room was clean, the bedding was phenomenal and the food was excellent. The breakfast buffet was huge, but the price was $12,95 per person, more than we usually spend on breakfast, even on vacation. Dinner was outstanding with wonderful presentation. If I had one complaint, and this is only after staying at a little mom and pop place in Bar Harbor earlier in our trip where the bathroom was spotless, it was the mildew on the bathtub caulking. All in all, the stay was great, and I would definitely consider staying here again.....
reviews.title: Nice, but overpriced

aka: Portland Marriott At Sable Oaks Hotel South Portland
description: The NEWLY RENOVATED Portland Marriott is complete! Improvements include, newly renovated lobby complete with a business center, contemporary designed guest rooms with plush bedding and new high speed in-room technology. Enjoy swimming in our new heated indoor pool, whirl pool. Indulge all of your senses in our new restaurant and lounge. Meet, greet and entertain in our spectacular grand ballrooms. The Portland Marriott at Sable Oaks is nestled on the hill of the scenic, yet modern, Sable Oaks community and just minutes from Portland Airport and historic downtown Portland. Enjoy fine-dining and boutique shopping in the Old Port. Bring the family to the legendary Old Orchard Beach, sight see at Portland Headlight historic lighthouse, enjoy a sunset cruise on Casco Bay or visit Portland's own Museum of Art. Offering dynamic meeting space, business center, golf course, indoor pool, fitness center and more Portland Marriott at Sable Oaks is the perfect location to exceed your expectations
